intro: Hello, I'm Farhan Maulana Pangestu, a Front End Developer, and I'm a Fresh graduate with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from Alma Ata University. I'm developer web applications. I have experience with programming languages React, Next.js, Node.js, Laravel, Express.js, and MongoDB. I'm currently looking for a job as a Fullstack Developer.
resumeDescription: Summary of my experience, education, and technical skills.
educationDescription: Informatics Engineering study program at Alma Ata University who has a special interest and talent in technology, especially in Web Development.
internshipDescription: I interned as a Front End Engineering Website Developer

services.FrontendDevelopmentDescription: I can create attractive user interface and client user websites using ReactJS, NextJS, and TailwindCSS.
services.BackEndDevelopmentDescription: I can create efficient server side and database driven websites using NodeJS, ExpressJS, Laravel, and TypeScript. which can be integrated with Front Development.
services.ResfulAPIDescription: I can create Restful API using NodeJS, ExpressJS, NextJs, and MongoDB, Firebase.
services.DicodingIndonesiaDescription: Is one of the MSIB KAMPUS MERDEKA BATCH 5 platforms, following the program (MBKM) at that time, for 6 months (1 semester), I got a lot of experience.
services.IDCampIndosatDescription: Is one of the platforms that I signed up for when I joined the Dicoding Indonesia MBKM, because of several mentors at Dicoding.
services.KampusMerdekaDescription: It is a platform that provides innovations created by the Ministry of Education and Culture in order to produce graduates who are ready to face social, cultural changes.
